doc.previous: A particularly important example is the position basis which is the basis consisting of eigenstates of the observable which corresponds to measuring position If these eigenstates are nondegenerate for example if the system is a single spinless particle then any ket is associated with a complex valued function of three dimensional space clarification needed
doc.after: This function is called the wavefunction corresponding to
